Description
AnalysisContainer
Carries the text split up by sentence and by word aswell as analysis results
Article
 
DBHandler

Takes care of every interaction with a given database file.

EqualyApplication
 
EqualyController
Controller containing the logic used to interact with user through web frontend.
Fragment
 
LanguageTagger
 
LanguageTaggerImpl
Takes text given by the user through the Web UI and determines its language Utilizes Lingua's pre-trained LanguageDetector Limitation here: For now a text is only either german or english
POSTagger
 
POSTaggerImpl
Implements the POS-Tagging in order to process text whose language was identified and which was tokenized already, utilizes OpenNLP's pretrained maxent models for german and english
SecurityConfig
Definition of a project-specific Spring security configuration.
SetFormatter
 
SetFormatterImpl
Implementing logic solely to safely merge together a token set its associated pos-tag set
Substitute
 
TextMerger
 
TextMergerImpl
Splicing together the token set to form a proposal for gendered alternative text to user input
ThymeleafAttributeContainer
Carrying all internally required Thymeleaf-specific attribute names in order to reduce interactions with hard-coded copy-Strings.
Tokenizer
 
TokenizerImpl
Splitting up a text that may contain words/sentences into a set tokens using the OpenNLP pre-trained Tokenizers for german or english
TranslateTicket
Used to gather user input from the frontend currently focused solely on the containing of user-entered 'to be analysed' text
WordExchanger
 
WordExchangerImpl
Handling the substitution process for words and articles through a step-by-step set of methods to first exchange substantives and then articles.
